historia.title: The origin of
content: Inspired by the legendary FreeTech Endurance format from the UK, we bring to Spain a unique experience: 8 hours of pure competition on stock 125cc motorcycles.
The philosophy is simple but powerful: level the playing field. With identical stock 125cc motorcycles, victory doesn't depend on the biggest budget, but on strategy, consistency, and team passion.
It's the perfect format for amateur teams, riders taking their first steps in competition, and veterans looking for the pure essence of motorsport.

cards.title: Accessible for everyone
cards.description: Affordable, reliable, and cheap to maintain bikes. So you can enjoy the experience without breaking the bank.

cards.title: Maximum mechanical equality
cards.description: With equal machines, everything is decided by strategy, rider skill, and teamwork.

cards.title: Immediate availability
cards.description: There's a huge supply of stock 125cc 4-stroke bikes, new or used: different models, styles, and prices.

cards.title: Pure competition
cards.description: With equal machines, the one with the best strategy wins. Rider skill and teamwork make the difference.

cards.title: Team spirit
cards.description: 8 hours can't be raced alone. Coordination, relays, and teamwork are the keys to success.

cards.title: Rider school
cards.description: Fun, light, and easy-to-ride bikes. Ideal for learning and improving your riding technique on track.

cards.title: Safety first
cards.description: Controlled speeds that allow competing with greater safety margins without losing any excitement.

cards.title: Guaranteed fun
cards.description: It's all about enjoying endurance racing with friends and the passion for pure motorcycling.
